item.title: #en @ 1529172447278379010
item.description:
The EU published today the list of 'High Value' datasets that should be:
*re-usable for free, using application programming interfaces
*available in machine-readable format
*downloadable in bulk, where possible
List in the annex: https://t.co/cReuIy8n61
(via @ton_zylstra)

item.description:
New incentive scheme for open science (co-devised with @april_cs and @juancommander).
Basic idea:
Publish a paper with open data = get 1 credit
Trade in 3 credits = un-publish any one paper with â€œdata available upon requestâ€
